summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5282 for the improvement of 13th Avenue Southwest, from West Roxbury Street to West Thistle Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing sewers and other improving the same, under Ordinance No. 61105, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund, and authorizing the issuance of bonds.
